articles.title: Traces of Ancient Ocean Discovered on Mars – This Means a “Higher Potential for Life” - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New evidence for an ancient northern ocean on Mars has been uncovered in a recently released set of topography maps. These maps offer the strongest case yet that the planet once experienced sea-level rise consistent with an extended warm and wet climate, whic…
articles.content:
ByPenn State UniversityOctober 30, 2022

articles.title: NASA details totally doable, not science fiction plan for sending Mars rocks to Earth - The Register
articles.description: So crazy, it just might work
articles.content: A sample depot will be set up on Mars for NASA's Perseverance rover to stash Martian rock and gas specimens ahead of a lander arriving to return the material to Earth sometime in the 2030s ... hopefu… [+3270 chars]

articles.title: ‘Golden rule’ for pruning lavender before winter - ‘stimulates greater flower production’ - Express
articles.description: Lavender plants are relatively low maintenance, however, there are some winter care best practices that gardeners need to be aware of over winter to ensure lavender survives. A gardening expert has shared the 'two most important' ways to prepare lavender for …
